legalResidency.title: Legal residency status in Turkey
legalResidency.description: Live and stay legally in Turkey with official government recognition and documentation

workPermit.title: Work permit eligibility and business opportunities
workPermit.description: Apply for work permits and establish business ventures in Turkey's growing economy

banking.title: Access to Turkish banking and financial services
banking.description: Open bank accounts, apply for loans, and access comprehensive financial services

socialSecurity.title: Social security and healthcare benefits
socialSecurity.description: Access Turkey's social security system and quality healthcare services

familyReunification.title: Family reunification opportunities
familyReunification.description: Bring your family members to Turkey and apply for their residence permits

citizenship.title: Path to Turkish citizenship eligibility
citizenship.description: After 5 years of continuous residence, become eligible to apply for Turkish citizenship
